burlap.domain.stochasticgames.normalform

Class SingleStageNormalFormGame.SingleStageNormalFormJointReward

    SingleStageNormalFormGame

    protected static class SingleStageNormalFormGame.SingleStageNormalFormJointReward
extends java.lang.Object
implements JointReward
    A Joint Reward Function class that uses the parent domain generators payout matrix to determine payouts for any given strategy profile.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Detail

      • reward

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> reward(State s,
                                                      JointAction ja,
                                                      State sp)
        Description copied from interface: JointReward
        Returns the reward received by each agent specified in the joint action. The returned result is a Map from agent names to the reward that they received.
        Specified by:
        reward in interface JointReward
        Parameters:
        s - that state in which the joint action was taken.
        ja - the joint action taken.
        sp - the resulting state from taking the joint action
        Returns:
        a Map from agent names to the reward that they received.
